q_en: How many sewing tasks did Skilled Sewers complete before June 2024, and what types of products were produced for these sewing tasks?

steps.sql: SELECT COUNT(st.id) AS completed_tasks, pt.description AS product_type FROM sewing_tasks st JOIN working_group wg ON st.working_group_id = wg.id JOIN order_product op ON st.order_product_id = op.id JOIN products p ON op.product_id = p.id JOIN products_types pt ON p.products_type_id = pt.id WHERE wg.name = 'Skilled Sewers' AND st.status = 2 AND st.end_time < '2024-06-01' GROUP BY pt.description;
steps.description: To find the number of sewing tasks completed by the working group 'Skilled Sewers' before June 2024 and the types of products produced, we need to join the sewing_tasks, working_group, order_product, and products tables. We will filter the tasks by the working group name, completion status, and end time, and then group the results by product type.
